price: Indeed, there is a message in this [Qur’an] for devoted worshipers.
arabic: إِنَّ فِي هَٰذَا لَبَلَٰغٗا لِّقَوۡمٍ عَٰبِدِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
